titles.title: A resolution supporting the people of Iran as they engage in legitimate protests, and condemning the Iranian regime for its murderous response.
A resolution supporting the people of Iran as they engage in legitimate protests, and condemning the Iranian regime for its murderous response.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Rule of law and government transparency
Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution condemns the violence by the Iranian government against protesting Iranian citizens and demands that Iranian leadership be held accountable for its actions against these protestors. Further, it affirms that the Senate stands with the people of Iran and calls on all peaceful and law-abiding nations to support the protests by the Iranian people.
